name: Raylib Pong
description:
Thought it'd be fun to over design pong from scratch, I've been working on this on and off for a while and it's been in an acceptable state for a bit so now I'm finally releasing it.

There are some more things I'm considering adding, such as the leaderboard. Currently the web version doesn't have any while the downloadable version does save scores, however it doesn't have a menu to display them yet.

Controls:

mouse for menus.

 left player w: up, s: down.

right player arrow keys.

Links:

github for raysan5's raylib: https://github.com/raysan5/raylib

github for this project (roast me): https://github.com/Caduckic/Raylib-Pong
